gr.forth.ics.graph.algo.transitivity
Interface SuccessorSet

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<Node>
All Known Subinterfaces:
MutableSuccessorSet
public interface SuccessorSet
extends java.lang.Iterable<Node>

Represents a set of nodes, used to model successor sets in Closure.

Method Summary

          Returns whether the specified node is contained in this set.

          Returns a Set instance containing all the nodes of this set.
